duties_responsibilities.duty: Support, mentor, and motivate hourly workforce in safety, quality, and productivity
Manage safety, quality, productivity, and customer delivery promises
Collaborate with support teams including Safety, Engineering, HR, etc. to develop plans to meet business objectives
Lift up to 49 pounds and frequently push, pull, squat, bend, and reach
Stand/walk for up to 12 hours during shifts
Work in variable environments (noise level, temperature, weather, etc.) and climb/descend stairs

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent, or 2+ years of Amazon (blue badge/FTE) experience
